name: LEGO Dimensions: Sensei Wu Fun Pack
summary: Become one with Spinjitzu Master Sensei Wu! Build Sensei Wu and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Acrobat, Spinjitzu, Stealth and Pole Vault abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. When he needs to fly, take off in the Flying White Dragon to boost your gameplay, and rebuild it into a Golden Fire Dragon and Ultra Destruction Dragon for upgraded in-game powers!
